about_the_game:
Blaston is a fast-paced PvP VR shooter where your survival hinges on one simple rule: Never. Stay. Still.

Duel players in a slow-motion bullet-hell as you collect weapons, personalize your loadout, and move your whole body to dodge oncoming fire as you line up your next perfect shot. Customize your weapons with game-changing attachments, glow up your avatar and arsenal with new looks, and create player-hosted tournaments in the Ozo Lounge. Get ready to break a sweat!

💥 FREE-TO-PLAY — Everyone can get in on the action and take aim on the competition
💥 REVAMPED STORE — Re-organized with all new categories for an improved player experience
💥 MORE WEAPON ATTACHMENTS — 24 brand new options for 8 different weapon types
💥 MORE STYLE OPTIONS — New avatar and weapon skins are ready to equip

Blaston Spectator app available for PC.

Blaston — a game of firepower and physicality from the cyberpunk warriors at Resolution Games.

Duel players in a slow-motion bullet-hell as you collect weapons, personalize your loadout, and move your whole body to dodge oncoming fire as you line up your next perfect shot. name: Blaston

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“One of the Best VR Experiences of 2020... with a surprising amount of strategy.”
5/5 – TheGamer

“Whether you’re a fan of competitive 1v1 battles, strategy-based gunplay, or just enjoy dodging bullets Keanu Reeves-style, Blaston is an absolute must-buy.”
VR Scout

“Challenges the notion of what a ‘VR shooter’ can be...a genius arrangement”
RoadToVR
short_description: In the slow-motion bullet-hell of Blaston, you duck, dodge, and weave to evade incoming attacks while preparing your dazzling next combos in a flash of skill. You feel like Neo and leave each session with your heart racing in this super fun tactical workout. Most importantly... Never. Stay. Still.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Swedish, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
